verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] creating an office within the agency that grants US citizenship to root out fraudsters and have their citizenship taken away .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: creating] [ARG1: an office within the agency that grants US citizenship to root out fraudsters and have their citizenship taken away] .

The Trump administration is creating an office within the agency [ARG0: that] grants US citizenship to [V: root] out [ARG1: fraudsters] and have their citizenship taken away .
The Trump administration is creating an office within the agency [ARG0: that] grants US citizenship to root out fraudsters and [V: have] [ARG1: their citizenship taken away] .
The Trump administration is creating an office within the agency that grants US citizenship to root out fraudsters and have [ARG1: their citizenship] [V: taken] [ARGM-DIR: away] .
